'''0.0.15a''' (Multiplayer Test 7) is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 4, 2009, at 16:58 UTC.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[10:52] * Notch changes topic to 'http://www.minecraft.net/  |  Multiplayer test is back down, gimme a sec.'<nowiki/>''" [...] "''[10:58] * Notch changes topic to 'http://www.minecraft.net/  |  Multiplayer test is up! Please test it :D'<nowiki/>''" (16:58 UTC)</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed the game not working.<ref>In [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.15a (Multiplayer Test 6)|0.0.15a (Multiplayer Test 6)]], Notch stated that the game was not working.</ref>

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Players appeared to be frozen at spawn.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''[11:01] <koekje4life> People are standing still in the spawn, doing errrr..... something''" [...] "''[11:01] <pyl> people are stuck :)''" (17:01 UTC)</ref>
